TopicTitle: Shouldn't Bug Reporting Include Save Files or Log-Files (of some kind)?

Articles.Content:
Tried to upload a report through the launcher earlier today.  No way to send anything other than JPGs.

That's kind of odd.

The launcher should at least include some way of sending log files (from past experiences) or players should be able to send saves.

It's certainly not ideal but I think you can add a .jpg extension to the log file to be able to submit it through the launcher. Hopefully it's clear to whoever ends up getting it that it's actually a text file and that they'll open it correctly.

45 minutes ago, whatsEJstandfor said:

It's certainly not ideal but I think you can add a .jpg extension to the log file to be able to submit it through the launcher. Hopefully it's clear to whoever ends up getting it that it's actually a text file and that they'll open it correctly.
